summary: Addressed 1 critical, 5 important, and 6 minor review comments across 8 sections. All critical and important items addressed; all minor items addressed. 2 important items declined (ASCII figures, table placeholders) as outside text revision scope.

revisions.action_item: Expand evaluation dataset acknowledgment, particularly Adversarial category (10 queries) insufficient for reliable conclusions
revisions.description: Strengthened the Adversarial category limitation acknowledgment with specific statistical reasoning (±0.30 CI), explicit statement that results are statistically underpowered, and concrete future work target (50+ queries)
revisions.before_summary: Brief note that Adversarial category is 'particularly small' and results 'should be interpreted as indicative rather than conclusive'
revisions.after_summary: Detailed statistical explanation: n=10 yields ±0.30 CI, results are 'statistically underpowered', 'preliminary and indicative of trends rather than definitive', with explicit priority to expand to 50+ queries

revisions.description: Added explicit naming clarification: 'Cognitive Hub' = architectural concept, 'Smart Query' = implemented system

revisions.description: Added dedicated 'Latency-Accuracy Tradeoff' paragraph analyzing when the 2x latency cost is justified
revisions.after_summary: New paragraph discussing deployment context, cost asymmetry, potential mitigations, and Pareto analysis as future work

revisions.description: Replaced three verbose subsections with Table 8 comparison table (8 concepts × 4 architectures), Key Parallels paragraph, and condensed Engineering Innovations

revisions.after_summary: Single Table 8 with concise Key Parallels and 4 Engineering Innovations
cascading_changes: Section 4 closing paragraph updated to reference Table 8

revisions.action_item: Reconcile contribution count: Section 1.3 lists 4, Section 7.1 lists 5

revisions.description: Split dense single paragraph into three paragraphs: problem, approach, results
